name: Boot Hill Heroes - Wild West Retro RPG with 1-4 Player Co-op
blurb: Boot Hill Heroes is a 4-player retro RPG set in the American Wild West with influence from spaghetti western film and SNES fantasy RPGs

rewards.reward: Oh how thoughtful!   We'll add your name to the game credits and give you a shout out on our website as our way of saying thanks!

Congratulations!  You've just pre-ordered your Windows version of Boot Hill Heroes.  You'll be one of the first to actually hold the finished game in your hands!  Well, not really, since it is digital download. (Plus previous reward tiers)

So generous!  Every little bit helps, and we are serious about thanking people.  If you'll allow us, we will call you up and thank you personally over the phone. (Sorry, continental US calls only - Plus previous reward tier)

Can you hear that?  That nothing you are hearing is the sound of the Boot Hill Heroes nonexistent soundtrack.  But thanks to your $30 donation we are one step closer to affording game music.  It's only fair that you get a free copy of the soundtrack once it exists.  (Plus previous reward tiers)

You look kinda pixelated, you NPC!  There are a lot of cowtown folk in this game and we'd love for you to be one of them.  $50 gets your likeness rendered to a character sprite and plopped into one of the seven towns in the game.  You can even have your own name and write your own dialogue - just watch the potty mouth please!  You'll also get a color printed copy and digital file (8.5x11) of your NPC so you can show everyone what you'd look like as a 16-bit wild west fella.   (Plus previous reward tiers)

Want to play Boot Hill Heroes now?  For $100 you'll be one of the exclusive few to receive beta access to early versions of Boot Hill Heroes so you can try out this four-player Wild West RPG adventure early.  As part of our beta team, we'll be asking you for feedback so you'll have an opportunity to shape the gameplay and make sure it is perfect. (Plus previous reward tiers)

NEW!  Having your own NPC is good, but where\u2019s he going to live?  We\u2019re adding a new town just for our backers called Kickstart Creek, and real estate is available!  You will get your own one-room house that you can design based on the different designs and objects we have available.  Choose the structure, interior design, and furnishings.  We\u2019ll create up to five original objects for you to decorate your house that you request as long as they are appropriate for the setting.  Note that Kickstart Creek is not guaranteed to be in the game, in which case you can relocate your house to one of six other towns of your choice.  (Plus previous reward tiers \u2013 including an NPC in the game who can live at this house)

Cake.  Yes, cake.  As a very special token of our thanks, we will bake you a cake that features characters from Boot Hill Heroes.  No kidding.  We really will bake you a real, edible cake and ship it to you.  Just try us.  (Domestic Only) (Plus previous reward tiers)

Choose your side:  the brave heroes of the Boot Hill Posse or the merciless villains of the Saints-Little gang.  A pledge of $250 allows you to design a character to join either group.  Your character will play a significant role in the game as either a former member of the original Boot Hill Posse or a member of the Saints-Little gang who just escaped from prison.  This is no small reward and we are limiting this one to 20 people (10 for each side).   We'll work with you to design your character how you want him or her.  You may have quests to assign the player, give them a valuable item, or reveal part of the story.  If you're lucky, you might even be a boss fight.   (Plus previous reward tiers)

Only one very generous backer will be granted the title of Mayor of Kickstart Creek and play city planner to help design the town!  You\u2019ll be able to choose the buildings and layout and have influence over the kinds of shops and saloons that will be in your town.  Want a statue of yourself adorning your city hall?  Or a gambling hall to entertain the locals?  How about your own boot hill cemetery at the edge of town?  We\u2019ll give you plenty of choices so you can design the Wild West town of your imagination!  (This includes all previous reward tiers except the $250 reward tier.  Your NPC will be the mayor)
